entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Crowsnest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Crowsnest 09:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -20.5°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 12.
